EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Vigor of Battle
EnhancementTreeItem.Description:
Passive bonuses: You gain 40 spell points, and each level of Unyielding Sentinel grants +4 Melee Power, +40 Spell points, and +1 Cleric, Favored Soul, and Paladin caster levels if you have any levels in those classes. +50 HP You gain +1 intimidate for each level of Unyielding Sentinel, including level 0.
Sentinel Stance: (Cooldown 20 seconds) Activate to enjoy the Vigor of Battle. +20 Positive Healing Amplification +50 HP
Enemies you hit gain Healing Touch for 3 seconds, which grants 10 temporary HP to targets they attack. (You can only be in one Sentinel Stance at a time.)

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Unbreakable
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Passive bonuses: +5 sacred bonus to natural armor. You gain the Diehard feat. Sentinel Stance: (Cooldown 20 seconds) You gain DR 10/epic.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Stand Against the Tide
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Passive bonus: +2 Attack. Sentinel Stance: (Cooldown 20 seconds) +1 melee damage, 20% threat generation, 5% fort, +1 reflex/fort/will saves. This bonus stacks up to four extra times while standing still.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Stalwart Guardian
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Passive bonus: +50 HP. +50 additional HP while enjoying the Vigor of Battle.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Heed No Pain
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Passive bonus: +10 Physical Resistance. +20 additional Physical Resistance while Unbreakable.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Steadfast
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Passive bonuses: +2 attack, +1 bonus to Fortitude, Reflex, and Will saves. You cannot be knocked down while Standing Against the Tide.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Divine Energy Resistance
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: This SLA grants 35 resistance to acid, cold, fire, sonic, electric for 1 min per character level [225/150/75] sp to all allies in the standard area of effect; centered on the caster. You can apply metamagic feats to this SLA for free (extend, quicken). The effect does not stack with Resist Energy spell.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Commanding Presence
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +50/100/150% Threat Generation

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Brace for Impact
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Passive Bonus: +[20/40]% fortification. +[1/2] Fortitude, Reflex, and Will saving throws.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Shield Prowess
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Passive Bonus: Your shield's AC contribution is increased by [15/30/50]%.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Unyeilding Sentinel: Ability I
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Choose either Constitution and Charisma

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Block Energy
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Passive Bonus: While blocking, you absorb [10/20/30]% of Acid, Cold, Electric, Fire, Force, Light, and Sonic damage.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Fanaticism
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Passive Bonus: You gain the Smite Evil feat. While you are Unbreakable, weapons you equip gain True Law if you are Lawful, and True Chaos if you are Chaotic, dealing 1d6 damage of that alignment to enemies of different alignments.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Endless Smiting
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Passive Bonus: +[1/2/3] Smite Evil use per rest. Smite Evil uses regenerate [10/20/30]% faster. (Note, this means you regenerate uses once every 81/72/63 seconds)

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Legendary Shield Mastery
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Passive Bonus: While wearing a shield, you gain +[5/10/15] Physical Resistance Rating and +[2/4/7]% chance to doublestrike.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Unyeilding Sentinel: Ability II
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Choose either Constitution and Charisma

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Renewal
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Active Ability: (Cooldown 3 seconds, 5 sp) Heals 1d2 HP per 4/3/2 character levels every 2 seconds for 8 seconds. If target is below 50% health, grants celestial shield absorbing the 30/40/50 next damage. Requires being in Unyielding Sentinel destiny to self-target. As a Spell-like ability it benefits from metamagic feats at no additional cost.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Intolerant Blows
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Active Ability: (Cooldown 20 seconds) Expend one Smite Evil: For 60 seconds you gain +200% Sacred bonus to threat generation and deal +1[W] damage.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Healing Hands
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Passive Bonus: You gain the Lay On Hands feat. You gain +25 positive spellpower.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Endless Lay on Hands
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Passive Bonus: +[1/2/3] Lay On Hands use per rest. Lay On Hands regenerate one use every 3 minutes and regenerate [0/10/20]% faster.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Unyeilding Sentinel: Ability III
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Choose either Constitution and Charisma

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Spark of Life
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Passive Bonus: your armor gains Deathblock, protecting you from death effects.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Light the Dark
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Active Ability: (Cooldown 12 seconds) Expend one Lay on Hands: Heals 150HP to allies around you, and deals that much damage to nearby undead enemies.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Purify Weapon
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Passive Bonus: If you are Good, weapons you equip gain Pure Good, dealing 1d6 Good damage vs. non-Good targets.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Unyeilding Sentinel: Ability IV
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Choose either Constitution and Charisma

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Hardened
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Passive Bonus: +[5/10/15] AC.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Strength of Vitality
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Passive Bonus: +10/15/20% Insight bonus to maximum hit points.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Ward Against Evil
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Passive Bonus: When you are hit or miss by Evil, you have 100% chance to deal [3/6/10]d6 Good damage to those attackers.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Anoint Weapon
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Passive Bonus: If you are Good, while you Stand Against the Tide weapons you equip gain Holy, dealing 2d6 extra damage vs. Evil targets.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Unyeilding Sentinel: Ability V
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Choose either Constitution and Charisma

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Resurrection
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Can cast Resurrection as a spell-like ability (Cooldown 6 seconds, Cost 15 sp).

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: 'Undying Vanguard' Epic Moment
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Active Ability: (Cooldown 2 minutes, usable once per rest) Heal yourself for 1000 HP. For 20 seconds, you gain 10,000 temporary HP.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Unyeilding Sentinel: Ability VI
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Choose either Constitution and Charisma
